name: personal-budget-2
description: __Project Title:__ Personal Budget 2   __Description:__ Node/Express API to manage a portfolio budget using a budget envelope strategy. Data is stored in PostgreSQL database.   __User can:__ - Create, read, update and delete envelopes - Transfer funds between envelopes - Create, read, update and delete transactions (records of funds spent from each envelope)
author: Yehor Zemzyulin
